author: Juha Haataja
content:
It seems that the dynamic range of the OM-D has generated a lot of (even heated) discussion in the forums. Your analysis seems to support the claim that the OM-D is indeed something special. 

I'm getting itchy hands, have to resist. (But then I have an allergy to non-pocketable cameras so I think I'm safe...)

But anyway, I love Keith. I think Keith has a lot of street cred. Though he made our youngest daughter laugh, I don't know why.
